item.title: 莉莉是奥克兰动物园救助的一只幼虎，有人看到它好奇地观看一部关于老虎的纪录片。动物园说它在 "了解自己的同类"。
item.description:
Lily, a tiger cub rescued by Oakland Zoo, was seen curiously watching a documentary about tigers. The zoo said she was “learning about her own kind.” https://t.co/DVe2gH7cpq pic.twitter.com/YQzHLxwsK1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 碧昂斯（Beyoncé）即将发行的新专辑正式命名为 "Cowboy Carter"。这位歌手本周早些时候通过她的网站透露了她将于 3 月 29 日推出的乡村音乐新专辑的名字：
item.description:
Beyoncé's upcoming album officially has a name, and it's "Cowboy Carter." The singer revealed the name of her new country album, which arrives March 29, via her website earlier this week.

Read more: https://t.co/uEKxhTtkFA pic.twitter.com/lzvUJfwHbg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 以下是今年芝加哥河染色活动的简要回顾，以及成千上万前来观看圣帕特里克节周末狂欢的人们。
item.description:

item.title: 众议院共和党议员迈克-特纳（Mike Turner）表示，他不同意前总统特朗普称一些移民为 "非人 "和 "动物"，但坚持认为只有特朗普 "才能解决 "南部边境的 "这场危机"。
item.description:
Rep. Mike Turner, a top House Republican, said he disagreed with former Pres. Trump calling some migrants "not people" and "animals" but insisted that only Trump "is going to be able to fix this crisis" at the southern border. https://t.co/FfRTXnv1n5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 众议员罗-卡纳（Ro Khanna）说，众议院上周通过的 TikTok 法案实际上并不能保护美国人，他转而推动其他立法，称这些立法能更好地防止外国对手获取私人信息。
item.description:
Rep. Ro Khanna said that the TikTok bill the House of Representatives passed last week wouldn't actually protect Americans, instead pushing for other legislation that he says would better prevent foreign adversaries from obtaining private information. https://t.co/jpagqYbhdo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：当局称，涉嫌杀害一名新墨西哥州州警和一名南卡罗来纳州医护人员的嫌犯在周日与执法人员发生枪战后被抓获。
item.description:

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）对美国在以色列与哈马斯（Hamas）的毁灭性战争中对他的领导能力提出的越来越多的批评进行了抨击，并表示压力不会阻止以色列取得 "全面胜利"。
item.description:
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu railed against growing criticism from the U.S. against his leadership amid the devastating war with Hamas, saying the pressure won’t stop Israel from achieving “total victory.” https://t.co/mdVkYaE9h6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 警方正在紧急搜捕杀害一名新墨西哥州警官的嫌疑人。据警方称，来自南卡罗来纳州马里恩县的贾雷米-史密斯（Jaremy Smith）仍然在逃，并被认为持有武器，十分危险。
item.description:
An urgent manhunt is underway for the suspect in the murder of a New Mexico State Police officer. Jaremy Smith of Marion County, South Carolina, remains at large and is considered armed and dangerous, according to police. https://t.co/9MDhFD2Pcl pic.twitter.com/mUwYtWBM7c

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 白宫重申支持一项旨在遏制中国与 TikTok 关系的法案。与此同时，白宫国家安全发言人约翰-柯比（John Kirby）表示，政府认识到许多美国用户的担忧。
item.description:
The White House reiterated support for a bill meant to curb China's ties to TikTok. At the same time, White House national security spokesperson John Kirby said the administration acknowledges the concerns of many American users. https://t.co/kJNJ8jTDai

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统特朗普在俄亥俄州的一次竞选活动中预言，如果他在 2024 年大选中落败，将引发 "血雨腥风"，并加强了反移民言论。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump predicts “bloodbath” if he loses 2024 election, ramps up anti-migrant rhetoric during a campaign event in Ohio. https://t.co/lV5MpYeTXw

item.title: 您在寻找牛肉、猪肉或鸡肉的替代品吗？新研究表明，这种爬行动物的肉更可持续，碳密集度更低。
item.description:

item.title: 两名男子因涉嫌炸毁一名妇女的住宅并计划将 "一条大蟒蛇放进受害人家中吃掉受害人的女儿 "而受到指控。
item.description:

item.title: 俄亥俄州最高法院自由派大法官占据多数席位已有近四十年之久。民主党人希望今年能有所改变，竞选活动将在周二的初选中初见雏形。
item.description:
It's been nearly four decades since liberal-leaning justices held a majority on Ohio's supreme court. Democrats hope this is the year that changes, in a campaign that will begin to take shape with Tuesday's primary. https://t.co/7BnMHt9S3F

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 纪念：演员兰斯-雷迪克（Lance Reddick）因出演《窃听风云》（The Wire）、《博斯》（Bosch）和《约翰-威克》（John Wick）而闻名，于 2023 年的今天去世。享年 60 岁。
item.description:
IN MEMORIAM: Actor Lance Reddick, known for roles in “The Wire,” “Bosch,” and "John Wick," died on this day in 2023. He was 60. https://t.co/2dKkWjTzPC pic.twitter.com/JoUseBGAcZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 根据一份新的联邦报告，2023 年仍有 MIS-C 病例发生，而未接种疫苗或接种疫苗后免疫力下降的儿童患这种疾病的风险最高。
item.description:
Cases of MIS-C are still occurring in 2023 and children who are unvaccinated or have waning immunity from previous vaccination are at the highest risk of developing the condition, according to a new federal report. https://t.co/VJ3k6LbEVC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 艾伦研究所的研究人员正在开展 "登月 "项目，比如绘制人脑地图，希望借此了解人体器官，帮助防治脑部疾病。
item.description:
Researchers at the Allen Institute are pursing "moonshot" projects, like mapping the human brain, in hopes of understanding the organ and to help fight brain diseases. https://t.co/TUMEu2KgUd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 选取彩票号码的策略充满了迷信色彩，从幸运号码到多年保持同样的选号方法，不一而足。一位母亲利用孩子的生日选号成功，帮助她赢得了 140 万美元。
item.description:
The strategy for picking lottery numbers can run the gamut of superstition, ranging from lucky numbers to keeping the same picks for years.
One mom found success using her child's birthdate, helping her win $1.4 million. https://t.co/uAesvS6vGq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 冰岛西南海岸的一座火山周六爆发，这是自12月以来的第四次火山爆发，导致渔业小镇格林达维克（Grindavik）的居民撤离：
item.description:
A volcano on Iceland's southwestern coast erupted on Saturday for the fourth time since December, prompting an evacuation for the fishing town of Grindavik, officials say.

Read more: https://t.co/tq2uQ4ksPs pic.twitter.com/yOvU19l4Qb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 在奈克斯-本尼迪克特去世后，@ABC 新闻采访了他以前的学生和当地的家长，他们表示，反 LGBTQ 政策和言论的影响在俄克拉荷马州的学校中日益受到关注，比如本尼迪克特曾经就读的奥瓦索高中（Owasso High School）。
item.description:
After Nex Benedict's death, @ABC News spoke with former students and local parents, who say that the impact of anti-LGBTQ policy and rhetoric is a growing concern in Oklahoma schools like Owasso High School, where Benedict was a student. https://t.co/QehAMA8vgj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 在气候变化、人口增长和耐药性的驱动下，真菌感染的危险性正在不断增加，美国疾病预防控制中心和世界卫生组织发出的新警告更是强化了这一点。
item.description:
Driven by climate change, population growth, and drug resistance, the danger of fungal infections is growing, reinforced by new warnings from the CDC and WHO. https://t.co/YxEC3U0Oeq
